Posts.Content: Mar 24, 2017 02:40AM Indialymphedemafoundation01 wrote: Dear Murthy, I represent India Lymphedema Foundation. This is fairly recently established non-profit organization. We are building resources, treatment option and network for lymphedema treatment providers and patients. I would be so glad to help your mother. If you can email me at ira_dave@yahoo.com, I am happy to make arrangements to understand her condition and see how we can help. Sincerely, Ira
